name: PUMA x Royal Challengers Bangalore Premium Men's Cap
desc: DescriptionElevate your RCB pride with the Royal Challengers Bangalore Men's Premium Cricket Cap.  Featuring a bold embroidered logo and the signature RCB insignia  on one side, along with the iconic PUMA Cat on the other, this cap is a perfect blend of team spirit and style. With an adjustable back for a personalized fit, it ensures comfort while showing off your unwavering loyalty to the team.Classic 6 Panel CapRoyal Challengers Bangalore embroidered logoRoyal Challengers Bangalore insigniaBaseball brimHook & loop clusure for snug fitPUMA Cat logo on the sideStyle:027206_01Color:For All Time RedRead more

name: PUMA x RCB 2025 Men's Official Match Jersey
desc: DescriptionShow your support for your beloved cricket team with the PUMA x RCB 2025 Men's Official Match Jersey. This perfect replica of the official jersey proudly showcases the iconic RCB crest. Designed with a regular fit, v-neck and short sleeves for style and comfort, it's the perfect gear for serious fans. Be it cheering from the stadium stands or shouting in front of your TV, embody the true spirit of a champion. With each ball, run, and wicket, experience the thrill of victory or the agony of defeat, standing with your team, every step of the way.Regular FitV neckShort sleevesPUMA cat logo brandingRCB crest logo at chestStyle:607346_02Color:PUMA Navy-Parakeet GreenRead more

name: PUMA x RCB 2025 Men's Replica Jersey
desc: DescriptionShow your spirit for your beloved cricket squad with the PUMA x RCB 2025 Men's Replica Jersey. Be the embodiment of your team's legacy by wearing RCB's celebrated emblem. This regular fit, v-neckline, and short-sleeved t-shirt provides a chic yet comfortable appeal. Whether you're witnessing the match live or cheering for your team at home on TV, stand alongside the warriors with unwavering enthusiasm. Regardless of triumph or loss, you'll be engaged for every run, every ball, and every wicket.Regular FitV neckShort sleevesPUMA cat logo brandingRCB crest logo at chestStyle:713734_02Color:PUMA Navy-Parakeet GreenRead more
